item.title: The Most Common Makeup Mistakes And How To Avoid Them!
item.description: I walk you through the most common makeup mistakes I see and share simple, professional techniques I use to fix them quickly without starting over, so your makeup looks clean and polished every time.

media:content.media:title: The Most Common Makeup Mistakes And How To Avoid Them!
media:content.media:description: I walk you through the most common makeup mistakes I see and share simple, professional techniques I use to fix them quickly without starting over, so your makeup looks clean and polished every time.

item.title: Proof You Can Create A Fall Look With Just 2 Shadows
item.description: I’m sharing an easy fall makeup look using just a dark concealer and one shimmer. This simple technique creates a polished, festive glam that works beautifully for special occasions and the holiday season.

item.title: Stop Warped Wings On Hooded Eyes With This Method
item.description: I’m showing how I create a clean winged eyeliner on hooded eyes using my simple tea method. This technique prevents distortion and works even if you have very little visible lid space.

item.title: Easiest Blending Technique For Smokey Cat Eyes
item.description: Easiest Blending Technique For Smokey Cat Eyes

item.title: Your Makeup Looks Off. Here’s 7 Ways How To Save It
item.description: I’m sharing seven everyday makeup mistakes I see all the time and the simple ways I fix them instantly, without removing makeup or starting over. These are quick, practical tips I use every day.

item.title: The Diwali Glam I Get Compliments On Every Year
item.description: Celebrate Diwali with Smitha’s most stunning festival-ready look! ✨ This tutorial walks you through a bronzy, dreamy, and glam makeup that’s surprisingly easy to recreate. From hydrating and prepping your skin to flawless base, soft yet smokey eyes, glittery lids, perfect brows, and a gorgeous lip combo - she covers every step to achieve a delicate yet striking Diwali glow. Perfect for festive parties, family gatherings, or any special occasion during the season!

item.title: Keep liner locked in through heat and humidity
item.description: A simple trick to keep your liner locked in through heat and humidity. Smudge-proof, sweat-resistant, and reliable all day.

item.title: This DIY Multichrome Trick Changes Everything
item.description: A simple DIY multichrome trick that instantly elevates your eye makeup. One easy technique with seriously eye-catching results.

item.title: Soft glam inspired by iconic elegance
item.description: Soft glam inspired by iconic elegance with a timeless, polished finish. Effortless beauty that enhances features without overpowering them.

item.title: Soft, Elegant Bridal Glam With A Priyanka Twist
item.description: A soft, elegant bridal glam look with a modern Priyanka-inspired twist. Timeless, radiant, and beautifully balanced for a polished yet effortless finish.

item.title: Cut crease made easy for hooded eyes
item.description: An easy cut-crease technique designed specifically for hooded eyes. Clean definition without complicated steps or heavy layering.

item.title: Three beginner styles anyone can master
item.description: Three easy makeup styles anyone can master, even if you’re a total beginner. Simple techniques that deliver polished results without overcomplicating your routine.

item.title: Make Under Eyes Look Smooth With These 5 Fixes
item.description: Five easy concealer tricks to fix under-eye dark circles, hollows, bags, and fine lines as skin matures. Learn simple technique changes that keep coverage smooth, bright, and crease-free.

item.title: Have you heard of "Puppy Eyeliner"? It's so cute!
item.description: Have you heard of "Puppy Eyeliner"? It's so cute!

item.title: This Eyeshadow Placement Makes Blending So Easy
item.description: Master a stunning eyeshadow look using geometric shapes! In this tutorial, Smith breaks down makeup into simple visual steps, showing how to frame your eyes, apply shadows, and create dimension - even for beginners. Plus, she shares her favorite base, brows, mascara, lashes, and lip products, along with tips for achieving a polished, radiant finish.

item.title: Hooded Eyes Deserve To Be Seen Too
item.description: Learn how to transform hooded eyes with a simple trick that doubles visible lid space! This tutorial shows step-by-step techniques for creating a new crease, applying eyeshadow that stays visible, and finishing with lashes and lip color for a polished, standout look.
